tha-ap397:6.2: araññe → vipine (bj) | irine (s2, s3, mr) | iriṇe (pts1)
tha-ap397:16.4: gāthā pabyāharī → gāthā'mā vyāharī (bj) | gāthā sabyāharī (s2, s3) | gāthā mavyāhārī (pts1)
tha-ap397:19.3: mahantassa → brahaṃ tassa (bj) | brahantassa (s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap397:26.1: caratā → caraṇā (si, pts1, mr) | carite (s2, s3)
tha-ap397:30.1: Idha passāmi → idhaddasāsiṃ (bj) | tamaddasāmi (s2, s3) | tamaddassāsiṃ (pts1)
